title: Promote Draft Version 29 to Production (Frontend Verification-Only)

requirements.summary: Prepare a frontend-side publish and verification checklist to promote Draft Version 29 to production and confirm core UI routes render successfully after publish (no code changes unless a blocking issue is found).
acceptanceCriteria: Draft Version 29 is promoted to production and becomes the default version users see.
A post-publish verification confirms the production app loads successfully and core routes render (Landing page, role selection, dashboards).

file_operations.description: Create a production publish + verification checklist focused on frontend behavior only (LandingPage when logged out; RoleSelectionModal and ProfileSetupModal after login; AdminDashboard/ClientDashboard/DriverDashboard rendering paths from frontend/src/App.tsx). Include explicit note to follow the constraint: do not modify any source code unless a blocking production issue is discovered during verification, and if discovered, document the issue and minimal fix scope before implementation.
